ObjectClass.Name: Chronoporter
ObjectClass.Description:
CHRONOPORTER:
Transports units through time Creates TSS (Temporal Solition Shields)

Objective.Name: Teleport
Objective.Details: Teleport to a specified location\or self-teleport within LOS range\Teleporters extend range and negate cost\ \Blocked by Temporal Soliton Shield (TSS)

ObjectClass.Name: Chronoporter (Wreckage)
ObjectClass.Description:
This Chronoporter is destroyed
No risk from further internal explosions
